The University of West Attica, provides the facility for accommodation to the beneficiary students.

Further information regarding the application procedure and the required documentation are provided to the students at the beginning of each academic year by the competent Directorate of Student Care.

 

Student Accommodation

The University of West Attica does not have privately owned dormitories, that could ensure the free of charge accommodation to the students.  However, the students are entitled to apply for free accommodation at the dormitory of the  National and Kapodistrian University of Athens, under condition that their  brothers or sisters are already registered students of the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens, and they already stay at the dormitories of the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens. For further information regarding the student accommodation at the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens dormitories,  the students who are interested in accommodation can contact  the following link http://fepa.uoa.gr/

In particular, the undergraduate students of the University of West Attica, who are interested in finding accommodation to the students’ dormitories of the  National and Kapodistrian University of Athens, have to submit their application to the competent Department of Financial Support for Food and Accommodation of the University of West Attica. The application with all the attached required documents, are defined by the Students’ dormitory of Athens, during the dates announced by the National and Kapodistrian University of Athens. The applications are approved by the competent bodies of the University under condition that they meet the requirements and the terms, in accordance with the current legislative framework.

It is noted that:

  1.  The free accommodation in the Student Dormitory of Athens, is provided to the beneficiary students for the academic year of submission of the application, that is, only for one academic year.
  2. The applicant students are entitled to submit an application form only for one dormitory.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
